Element.Description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms. This identifies the European invoice norm, as well as any extensions applied. The identification may include the version of the specification.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the invoice in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Response identifier
Element.Description: A response identifier enables referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Response issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Response issue time
Element.Description: The time at which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Document reception date
Element.Description: Date when the referred document was received.

Element.Name: Response textual notes
Element.Description: Comments or instructions relevant to the response, including the date that the reported decision becomes effective.

Element.Name: Sender electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the party sending the document.

Element.Name: Sender identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of the party sending the document.

Element.Name: Sender name
Element.Description: Name of the party sending the document.

Element.Name: Receiver electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of the party receiving the document. Electronic address of the party receiving the document.

Element.Name: Receiver identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of the party receiving the document.

Element.Name: Receiver name
Element.Description: Name of the party receiver the document.

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: A code that specifies the sellers decision given in the response. The code of the response must be included, it is a description about the result of the transaction, in the case of the Publication request, the description can be "in progress", "publish", "rejected" or "received".

Element.Name: Received notification request
Element.Description: Identifier of the received notification for publication. Identifies the notification request that was received.

Element.Name: Notice form code
Element.Description: Code specifying the type of forms.
